root: ^Whew! That was one of the more thorough ass-whoopings I've been a part of. Ouch.

g-0: ^I'll take care of your babies, captain. I'll figure everything out- you can pass on now.
g-1: ^LORD OF THE FLIES: ..... thank you, dear....

s: ^...I should have gotten the Lord to fill out a customer satisfaction survey before they discorporated into malevolent mist. Dang. Raising your children counts as above and beyond customer service, right? Right?
